text: Hi guys, I would like to know if I can use fields (modulefields) in conditional mode ( with react)
I saw that I can use visibility, but I would like to show fields conditionally after for example a GET
Show fields - like in the editor?

No, our JS modules do not add features that change how fields get rendered in the editor. As things are right now, think of the field components/fields.jsx we offer in JS moduiles as a better, more dynamic way to _define_ componets.

Said another way, we compile fields.jsx down to fields.json at build time and our editors are looking at that fields.json (not executing any of your field React code)
